Change Log

Release 0.3.0

    New Features

  • Data cursor.

    Changes

  • Mouse/keyboard handling, fundamental transformations (shift, rotation, projection etc.) and lighting have made it into the new class ExtGLWidget.
  • Enrichment type  USERENRICHMENT resp. class UserEnrichment introduced. It makes the semantics clearer and should prevent the abuse of VertexEnrichments as a base class for Enrichments not designed for vertex data utilization.
  • calculateHull() moved to Plot3D
  • Deprecated functionality removed (SurfacePlot::createDataRepresentation variants)

    Bugs

  • Internal class DataRow renamed to DataColumn and vice versa.


Release 0.2.6

    Bugs

  • Shift limitation removed (reported by Adam Gurson)
  • Long lasting error: Annoying crashs on particular linux systems under very specific conditions have been fixed (reported by Ion Vasilief, Andreas Haumer)
  • The inherited renderPixmap() wasn't working properly (reported by Michal Kral)
  • Platform-dependent issues (reported by Todd Keith, Yu Ning, Jeremy Mann)

Release 0.2.5

This release  is a pure refactorization in order to support Qt4. It opens a patch only cycle of 0.2.? releases (used mainly to adapt to new released Qt4 versions). This will happen in parallel to Qwt3D 0.3.? branch development being the single one introducing new features (likewise supporting Qt3 and Qt4  with the same code base).

    Changes

  • Core library Qt3 and Qt4 ready.
  • Functional identical examples for Qt3 and Qt4
  • both items have native support (no usage of Q3... compatibility classes)

    Open Issues

  • Label background not transparent for Qt 4.0.0
  • Usage of the libraries namespace Qwt3D leads to non-compilable code in some cases, if used with Qt 4.0.0 and VC6. This is actually a Visual C++ 6.0 bug. Trolltech accepted the issue (ID 78398)

    Workaround:

    Replace declarations like

    class Plot : public Qwt3D::SurfacePlot  {...}

    by

    typedef Qwt3D::SurfacePlot SPLot;
    class Plot : public SPlot {...}

    if Plot requires moc interaction.

Release 0.2.4 beta

    New Features

  • [Plot3D] Keyboard handler functions
  • I/O Interface improvements and unification
  • Nonlinear scales are possible now (among these log10 scales are fixed part of the Axis interface). Additionally the numbering scheme has been extended by user-definable items  - e.g. 'A','B',... date/time etc. (suggestion by g.kondaiah). Inspect the axes example for applications.

    Changes

  • New classes:
    • LinearAutoScaler
    • Scale, LinearScale, LogScale
    • IO, IO::Functor, PixmapWriter, VectorWriter, NativeReader (IO::Functor now - FEM reader has been moved to examples)
    • qwt3d_ptr
  • Caused by the I/O Interface changes some functions are know deprecated.
  • For the same reason, NativeReader::read and NativeReader::setFilename are obsolete now and have been removed from the API.
  • The examples ui file are now created from the Designer application accompanying Qt 3.3.2.
  • Small (very unsophisticated) autopointer class for internal use added
  • valgrind script and configuration added (CVS only)
  • 'beta' removed from file name for the dynamic library (Unix)
  • [Axis] setScale() and scale() renamed to setScaling() and scaling() in order not to confict with the new setScale functionality.
  • [SurfacePlot]  createDataRepresentation renamed in loadFromData (the old functions are still available but deprecated)

    Bugs

  • Potential memory leaks fixed
  • Lighting: coordinate system issue fixed
  • Lighting: normalization issue (affected zooming & scaling) fixed

Release 0.2.3 beta

    New Features

  • Enrichments  (initial suggestion by Nuno Almeda & Jonathan Lees)
  • Standard point plot style (Enrichment based) 
  • User defined plotting styles
  • Lighting
  • Parametric Surfaces

    Changes

  • [gl2ps] Version 1.1.2 integrated
    • Compressed PS and PDF output. This is standard behaviour for unix now, but depends on the existence of zlib (also avail. for win32 and other systems)
    • PDF output bug causing pdfTex error on some systems fixed
    • zlib sources removed, gl2ps' zlib use is configurable by the qmake CONFIG flag 'zlib' in qwtplot3d.pro now

    Bugs

  • Some conversion warnings fixed (reported by  Georg Altmann)
  • All sources in the tarball have Unix line breaks now (some gcc's felt offended)
  • Missing namespace std qualifiers added (reported by John Cummings)
  • [Plot3D]   mouse_input_enabled_  not initialized (reported by Stacy Loesch)
  • [ColorLegend]    Funny!  g++ doesn't like the name 'or' in setOrientation(ORIENTATION or, SCALEPOSITION pos) --> changed to 'ori'. (reported by Nuno Almeida)
  • [qwt3d_mousekeyboard.cpp]  max() used w/o 'using namespace std' (reported by Nuno Almeida)


Release 0.2.0 beta

    New Features

  • PS, EPS and PDF output via gl2ps       //  see here for more information
  • Color legends
  • Shading

    Changes 

  • PDF output improved
  • Style FLOORMESH removed
  • [Rectangular meshes]
    • Performance improvement for drawing of filled polygons (uses  GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP now)
    • Mesh drawing algorithm complexity is O(m+n) now instead O(mn) where  m and  n are the row and column numbers
  • [Plot3D]
    • setPlotStyle, setFloorStyle don't call updateData() and updateGL() any longer
    • setShading, shading pair for setting/returning shading style (flat or Gouraud). Default is Gouraud.
    • updateColorLegend, legend for color legend access
    • setCaption... -> setTile... (consistency)
    • updateFloorData removed
  • [SurfacePlot]
    • New function facets
    • New function setSmoothMesh
  • [CoordinateSystem] 
    • A coordinate grid can be drawn. See setGridLines etc.
    • adjustNumbers, adjustLabels
  • [Axis]
    • New function limits to get start and stop value
    • New functions to access tic mark positions
    • adjustNumbers, adjustLabel
  • [LabelPixmap]
    • Obsolete setColor functions removed
    • renamed to Label
    • adjust, gap
  • AutoScaler class encapsulates the axes autoscaling feature
  • qwt3d_plane.h -> qwt3d_colorlegend.h
  • qwt3d_labelpixmap* -> qwt3d_label*
  • C++ sources by qwt3d_ prefixed (consistent with header naming scheme)

    Bugs 

  • [examples] Some missing calls to QGLWidget::makeCurrent() inserted
  • Sometimes the last minors inherited the majors linewidth
  • Sporadic misbehaviour of autoscaler
  • Limits (DBL_EPSILON) for scale and zoom
  • Shader did not work correctly ( only flat shading )

Release 0.1.3 alpha

   New Features

  • Mailing list ( http://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/qwtplot3d-interest )
  • Completed change to namespace Qwt3D
  • Vector data
  • Normal vectors

    Changes

  • Extracted new base class Qwt3D::Plot3D  from SurfacePlot maintaining all the data unrelated stuff
  • Renamed QwtPlot3D to Qwt3D::SurfacePlot
  • Windows dll

Release 0.1.2 alpha

   New Features

  • Non-rectangular meshes
  • FEM data reading
  • Mesh floor style

    Changes

  • Isolines revised

Release 0.1.1 alpha

   New Features:

  • Standard mouse handler (rotate, shift, scale, zoom data - try your left mouse button with ALT,CTRL,SHIFT and combinations)
  • Mesh2 example adapted ( relies not longer on qwt library)
  • New examples: simpleplot (integrated) , autoswitch, colormodels Autoswitching axes scales (axes in front get automatically a scale)
  • Isoline contouring
  • Autoswitching

The offline version of the documentation is not longer supported as download from the sourceforge download area. Instead, you can get them from QwtPlot3D's Homepage as zip archive. The best choice however, is to create the API part from the sources. A doxygen configuration exists in doc/Doxyfile.doxygen.
